eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph

Class JobGenericOutputVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph.AbstractJobVertex
      • eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph.AbstractJobOutputVertex
        • eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph.JobOutputVertex
          • eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph.JobGenericOutputVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.esotericsoftware.kryo.KryoSerializable

    public class JobGenericOutputVertex
extends JobOutputVertex
    A JobGenericOutputVertex is a specific subtype of a JobOutputVertex and is designed for Nephele tasks which sink data in a not further specified way. As every job output vertex, a JobGenericOutputVertex must not have any further output.
    Author:
    warneke
